entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:07 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 99 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
